Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends provisions of the freedom of information law to the state legislature; repealer
Summary: Extends provisions of the freedom of information law to the state legislature.
LawCode: Amd §§86, 87 & 89, rpld §88, Pub Off L; amd §§105 & 7802, CPLR; amd §713, Exec L; rpld §70-0113, En Con L; rpld §308 sub 4, County L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, the civil practice law and rules and the executive law, in relation to extending provisions of the freedom of information law to the state legislature; and to repeal section 88 of the public officers law, section 70-0113 of the environmental conservation law and subdivision 4 of section 308 of the county law relating thereto
